name: IT TAKES THE BALL
description:
Be careful! The game may be strongly condemned by dog lovers!
Because if you don't play well, the cute dog in the game will die before your eyes.

The system of this game is very simple.What your need is just use A key, D key and space bar on the keyboard and mouse to complete the whole game.

Press A to move to the left, press D to move to the right, press space to jump up.

Use the mouse to control the pitch of the racket.

Waving the racket to control the ball is the trick of this game.

Swing the racket, control the ball to get coin(money), and move forward with the ball.

Don't let your ball fall to the ground. The dog will swallow the ball that falls to the ground, cause itself to die and game over.

But if the ball does not leave the racket for a long time, the dog will bite you and make you unable to move, so you have to keep waving the racket as you carry the ball forward.

The game is successful only when you reach the end and get enough coin(money).

In the course of the game, you may leave your dear dog several times to get the final success.

This game is too adult to for puppies .So ,don't let puppies see it during the game .
